DependNGInstallerToggle.onDown: if not tommot_dependnginstaller then extensions.load("tommot_dependnginstaller") else extensions.unload("tommot_dependnginstaller") end
DependNGInstallerToggle.title: Toggle DependNG.resolve - Installer
DependNGInstallerToggle.desc: Shows or hides the UI window for the DependNG.resolve - Installer by TommoT.
